name: Fantasy Life Online
description:
Live a whole new life here!

Fantasy Life Online is the sequel to Fantasy Life, the popular Japanese console game by LEVEL-5.

Log in now and claim the Welcome Gift.

– Game Features –
※ Switch freely to shape 12 kind of lives!
There are 12 different Lives in the game, which can be divided into three categories: Fighter, Gatherer, and Manufacturer.

※ Trial of Stars: Upgrade your skills and become a Master.
Each Life can be upgraded through Trial of Stars, which will also be rewarded with Appearance Suits.

※ Live your life as you wish
There are three gameplays in the game: Adventure, Field Search and Village.

※ Play Solo or with friends online
The upper limit of Co-op Mode is 4.
You can choose to go on adventures with friends or by yourself. Different modes come with various fun and rewards. Team up and enjoy life!

※Build your village and have fun
You can design your own village and have friends over to visit.
After the construction, you can gather material, cook, and forge weapons here to upgrade your character.

※ Thrilling combat & epic adventure
RPG Style: Main Story updated to Chapter 4.
By completing Story Quests, players can challenge advanced Bosses in maps and make corresponding Suits

※ Newbie Gift: Adventure Carnival
Log in and complete quests to gain event-exclusive Points, Dosh, Diamonds, Gear, and Summon Coins.

***COMPATIBILITY***
Requires iOS 9.0 or later
Compatible with iPhone6 or later
publishers: Hong Kong Bao Chuan Software Technology
